General.Name: Cementos Bio-B
General.Description: Cementos Bio Bio S.A. engages in the production and sale of cement, lime, and concrete products in Chile and internationally. It operates through Cement and Lime segments. The company is involved in the manufacture and sale of lime for use in the extraction of silver, gold, lithium, and iodine applications, as well as copper concentrators; and provision of ready-mix concrete, gypsum, and limestone products. Cementos Bio Bio S.A. was incorporated in 1957 and is based in Providencia, Chile.
General.Address: Alfredo Barros ErrAzuriz No. 1968, Providencia, Chile
